Models#

The following is a list of abstract classes that are used to define the interface for all models.

class abcmodel.models.AbstractModel[source]#

Bases: object

Abstract model class to define the interface for all models.

class abcmodel.models.AbstractRadiationModel[source]#

Bases: AbstractModel

Abstract radiation model class to define the interface for all radiation models.

tstart: float#

Start time of the model.

abstractmethod run(state, t, dt, const)[source]#
class abcmodel.models.AbstractLandSurfaceModel[source]#

Bases: AbstractModel

Abstract land surface model class to define the interface for all land surface models.

abstractmethod run(state, const, surface_layer)[source]#
abstractmethod integrate(state, dt)[source]#
class abcmodel.models.AbstractSurfaceLayerModel[source]#

Bases: AbstractModel

Abstract surface layer model class to define the interface for all surface layer models.

abstractmethod run(state, const)[source]#
abstractmethod static compute_ra(state)[source]#
class abcmodel.models.AbstractMixedLayerModel[source]#

Bases: AbstractModel

Abstract mixed layer model class to define the interface for all mixed layer models.

abstractmethod run(state, const)[source]#
abstractmethod statistics(state, t, const)[source]#
abstractmethod integrate(state, dt)[source]#
class abcmodel.models.AbstractCloudModel[source]#

Bases: AbstractModel

Abstract cloud model class to define the interface for all cloud models.

abstractmethod run(state, const)[source]#
